text: Replying to @Anna_Soubry @peoplesvote_uk and @AngusMacNeilSNP You either believe in democracy, and the idea of Loser's Consent, or you don't and feel it's right to annul the votes of the 17.4 million people who voted to leave the EU. You can't believe in it, and revoke it, at the same time.

You don't agree with her and Angus saying we could get a hard brexit just down to the vote of maybe 35% of the British population? Instead of just insulting her why not discuss what she said? Why just put the knife in? She did it for the good of the country as she saw it.

Replying to @Anna_Soubry @peoplesvote_uk and @AngusMacNeilSNP Totally on your side but if you were leading the Torries and  were in @BorisJohnson hot seat how easy would it be for you to ask and get support a @peoplesvote_uk?

Replying to @Anna_Soubry @peoplesvote_uk and @AngusMacNeilSNP Or you can just believe in democracy and losers consent and implement the original people’s vote of 2016

Probably worse than the one now: tories 23% labour 22% Brexit Party 15% Libdem 15% SNP 10% others 10% No clear winners. Referendum is the only solution, followed by an election.
